actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to provide for an accelerated cost-of-living increase in social security benefits.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Requires the Secretary of Health, Education, and Welfare to increase, in accordance with the provisions of this Act, the monthly benefits and lump-sum death payments payable under title II (Old-Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act by the percentage by which the Consumer Price Index for the month of October 1974 exceeds such index for the month of January 1974.

titles.title: A bill to provide for an accelerated cost-of-living increase in social security benefits.
